sentences.english: The youngest Tarleton boy was automatically excluded from any of the boys' parties.

sentences.english: Stalluponen was a small town twenty five miles to the east of Gumbinnen.
sentences.chinese: 斯塔勒鲁旁是一个位于贡比嫩以东25英里的小城。

sentences.english: The youngest Tarleton boy had been friends with King and Cal.
sentences.chinese: 塔勒藤最小的儿子与卡巴顿和他哥哥是朋友。
